--- select_singer_with_having.sql
SELECT
  SingerID
FROM
  Singers
GROUP BY
  SingerID
HAVING
  SingerID = 1

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  9,
          end:  17,
          Name: "SingerID",
        },
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   18,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.TableName{
            Table: &parser.Ident{
              pos:  25,
              end:  32,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:   (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: &parser.GroupBy{
      pos:   33,
      Exprs: []parser.Expr{
        &parser.Ident{
          pos:  44,
          end:  52,
          Name: "SingerID",
        },
      },
    },
    Having: &parser.Having{
      pos:  53,
      Expr: &parser.BinaryExpr{
        Op:   "=",
        Left: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  62,
          end:  70,
          Name: "SingerID",
        },
        Right: &parser.IntLiteral{
          pos:   73,
          end:   74,
          Base:  10,
          Value: "1",
        },
      },
    },
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT SingerID FROM Singers GROUP BY SingerID HAVING SingerID = 1
